## Duration Preparation

This feature shows the time spent (seconds) on the last call.

Measurement: Quantitative (Interval)

Data type: Numeric

```{r echo=TRUE}
#view the structure of the duration column 
str(data$duration)
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
#view the structure of the duration column 
summary(data$duration)
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Summary of Duration

-   Pre-clean Checks

    ```{r echo=TRUE}
    #find the sum of NA values 
    dur_na_sum <- sum(is.na(data$duration))
    print(dur_na_sum)

    #find the sum of null values 
    dur_null_sum <- sum(is.null(data$duration))
    print(dur_null_sum)
    ```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Visualization of Duration

```{r echo=FALSE}
Duration <- data$duration
duration.hist <- hist(Duration, main = 'Histogram of Duration (before cleaning)')

```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Visualization of Duration

```{r echo=FALSE}

#density plot for alternate visualization
Duration <- data$duration
d <- density(Duration,na.rm = T)
plot(d,frame=FALSE, col = "Blue",main = 'Density plot of Duration (before cleaning)')
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Visualization of Duration

-   conversion from SECONDS to MINUTES

```{r echo=FALSE}

data$duration <- round(as.duration(data$duration) / dminutes(1))

data$duration <- ifelse(data$duration>12, mean(data$duration), data$duration)

Duration <- data$duration
duration.hist <- hist(Duration,main = 'Histogram of Duration (after cleaning and conversion)')
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Visualization of Duration

```{r echo=FALSE}
d <- density(data$duration,na.rm = T)
plot(d,frame=FALSE, col = "Blue",main = 'Density plot of Duration (after cleaning and conversion)')
```
